2098110.name: Model Builder: Into The Stars DLC
2098110.description:
Expand your collection of scale model kits with this new DLC pack!

Model Builder: Into the Stars DLC contains three new space-themed models. Every new model is linked to a new quest and new Steam Achievement! Get them all!

NEW MODELS


Continue your epic journey in the scale modeling world! Inside this DLC pack, you will find three new scale model kits:

James Webb Telescope
Supernova Chaser
Texan Vulture Rocket with a launch pad

Every new model is connected to a new quest with a different task and new painting schemes to create! We are also introducing new Steam Achievements to unlock with this DLC.

Remember: This content requires the base Model Builder game on Steam in order to play.
2098110.supported_languages:
英语*, 波兰语, 德语, 意大利语, 法语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 简体中文, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 俄语, 日语, 韩语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
